SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Enable server capability
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: If enabled, the server UI is displayed and you can turn on and off the server. Disable it if you don\'t want any server capabilities at all (as before version 2).

EditTextPreference.app:title: Port where the server listens
EditTextPreference.app:dialogMessage: Ensure the same value is configured in the extension. A change here requires a restart of the server.

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Autostart when vault is unlocked
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: If enabled, the server starts listening every time the vault is unlocked.

SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:title: Hide server panel
SwitchPreferenceCompat.app:summary: Hides the panel which gives you access to the server
